channel.title: How can i changed my weapons fighting style from melee to range?
channel.description: Someone please help me with my situation..! I am trying to make my range weapon range but instead it melees...how do i fix?

item.title: How can i changed my weapons fighting style from melee to range?
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Sivart:

Ok i went to client.class and did ctrl+f to find. then i pasted this [public int GetWepAnim(int id)] it didnt work so i typed this [public int] still didnt work so i tryed this [GetWepAnim(int id)] still no progress so now i tryed [GetWepAnim] annd i found that but idk what to do with it…because its not what you told me to search…

He meant Client.Java, try searching in that.

item.title: How can i changed my weapons fighting style from melee to range?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

if Your using delta witch you probably are just go into The Client class and search public int GetWepAnim(int id)

There abought 3 others like walk/stand run and Block Find the emote you want to use and put it here #### item id, @@@@ Emote id use that template

if(id == ####) { return @@@@; }
